cast.name: 桃乐丝·奥里奥丹 Dolores O'riordan

director.name: 奥利维埃·达昂 Olivier Dahan

introduction: Issued in a standard DVD jewel case with clear DVD tray and a 16-page booklet with photos and credits.Celebrates 10 years of the best of THE CRANBERRIES in one package. Along with the 17 Music videos, a full length concert recorded at Vicar Street. Ireland in 2000. 4 Alternative Takes. 3 additional live performaces, a documentary and DVD-Rom section are also included. As an extra bonus, the newly recorded video for "Stars" is featured for the very first time.ALTERNATIVE TAKES- Dreams- Ridiculous Thoughts (Previous Unreleased)- Whe You're Gone (Previous Unreleased)- AnalyseLIVE FAVOURITES- Daffooil Lament 94 Astoria UK- Empty 94 Astoria UK- Sunday Detroit USALIVE AT VICAR STREETRecorded live at Vicar Street, Dublin, Ireland - November 11, 2000- Time is Ticking out- Linger- In the Ghetto- Ode to My Family- Shattered- Animal Instinct- Loud and Clear- I Can't Be With You- AnalyseRunning Time: 34 min. approx.DOCUMENTARY- 99 Love Life & Rock n' RollRunning Time: 26 min. approx.PERSONALIZED PLAYLIST DVD-ROM FEATURES- Interactive Calendar- Slide Show- Wallpapers- Web linksALSO AVAILABLE ON CDThe Cramberries - Stars: The Best Of 1992 - 2002Region: All (Zero)
